resources.string: How well do you know Final Fantasy?
Question 1:\nWhich Final Fantasy was the first 3D game of the franchise?
Question 2:\nWhy are the games called Final Fantasy?
Question 3:\nWhich villain came the closest to accomplishing his goals?
Question 4:\nWhich Final Fantasy was the first to introduce the Active Time Battle (ATB) gauge?
Question 5:\nWhat are the official mascots of Final Fantasy?
Question 6:\nWhat is the name of the talented engineer who is featured in every game since the second?
Because the first game saved the studio
